summary: This document contains financial account information related to Jeffrey Epstein and his entity, Great St. Jim, LLC. It includes details about the opening of a commercial checking account and the certification of beneficial ownership, indicating Epstein's significant ownership stake in the entity. This document contains various legal agreements and certifications related to Great St. Jim, LLC, including the Articles of Organization, Operating Agreement, and actions taken by the sole member following the death of Jeffrey Epstein. It outlines the management structure, ownership, and operational procedures of the company, as well as the appointment of new managers after Epstein's passing. This document includes a resolution by the Managers of a company related to Jeffrey Epstein, authorizing actions to be taken on behalf of the company. It also contains a Certificate of Good Standing for GREAT ST. JIM, LLC, confirming its legal status and compliance with the laws of the U.S. Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the owner of the account for Great St. Jim, LLC, and is mentioned multiple times in relation to the account opening and beneficial ownership certification.

persons.name: Darren Indyk
persons.context: Darren Indyk is mentioned as a signatory on the account documents, indicating his involvement in the account opening process.

persons.name: Greg St. Jim LLC
persons.context: Great St. Jim, LLC is the legal entity for which the account is being opened, and it is associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Erika A. Kellerhals
persons.context: Erika Kellerhals is the organizer of Great St. Jim, LLC, and is mentioned as the initial manager and signatory for various agreements.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is named as a co-executor of Jeffrey Epstein's estate, which has vested ownership of the company following Epstein's death.

persons.name: Richard D. Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is also named as a co-executor of Jeffrey Epstein's estate, involved in the management of Great St. Jim, LLC after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Osbert B. Potter
persons.context: Osbert Potter is mentioned in the context of certifying the existence of Great St. Jim, LLC in the Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is also named as a co-executor of the estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein, participating in the execution of the consent document.

persons.name: Tregenza A. Roach
persons.context: Tregenza A. Roach is the Lieutenant Governor of the U.S. Virgin Islands who certifies the good standing of GREAT ST. JIM, LLC.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is the sole owner of Great St. Jim, LLC, as indicated in the account opening documents.
Darren Indyk is mentioned as a signatory on the account documents associated with Jeffrey Epstein.
Darren Indyke is a co-executor of the estate of Jeffrey Epstein, managing the estate's interests including Great St. Jim, LLC.
Richard Kahn is a co-executor of the estate of Jeffrey Epstein, involved in the management of the estate's interests.
Erika Kellerhals is the organizer and initial manager of Great St. Jim, LLC, overseeing its operations.
Both Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn serve as co-executors of the estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Tregenza A. Roach, as Lieutenant Governor, certifies the good standing of GREAT ST. JIM, LLC.

events.title: Formation of Great St. Jim, LLC

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the beneficial owner of Great St. Jim, LLC, with a 100% ownership stake.
The document includes multiple references to the opening of a commercial checking account for Great St. Jim, LLC.
Darren Indyk is mentioned as a signatory on the account documents.
The address for the account is listed as 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St. Thomas, VI 00802.
The document is part of a certification process required for legal entities opening bank accounts.
Jeffrey Epstein was the sole member of Great St. Jim, LLC until his death on August 10, 2019.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard D. Kahn are co-executors of Epstein's estate and are now involved in the management of the company.
Erika A. Kellerhals is the organizer and initial manager of Great St. Jim, LLC.
The company was formed on October 26, 2015, and has been registered to conduct business in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
The document includes various legal agreements and certifications related to the company's operations and management.
The document includes a resolution by the Managers of a company related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn are co-executors of Epstein's estate.
GREAT ST. JIM, LLC is confirmed to be in good standing as of October 18, 2019.
The document is certified by Tregenza A. Roach, the Lieutenant Governor of the U.S. Virgin Islands.
The company has complied with all necessary filings and payments to maintain its legal status.
